ygData.subject: Re: Sense Magic Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: In this paladin s opinion, sense magic is an utter waste of a spell slot because: a) flash of light increases divination b) sense magic imparts no useful or
ygData.messageBody:
In this paladin's opinion, sense magic is an utter waste of a spell slot
because:
a) flash of light increases divination
b) sense magic imparts no useful or new information about an item

At level 9 we *could*, however, use a conjuration or evocation based spell,
however useless, simply as a way to build THOSE skills. I would write to
Verant on this subject if I had their email address. Anybody have it?

Kaladin, Holy Warrior of Tunare (who senses nothing magical about the 'sense
magic' spell)

> From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
>
> --- Tim West <twest@...> wrote:
> > Has anyone found a use for this spell yet ?
